body: Aachen for international projects We manage projects and reorganize company processes in automotive, aviation, energy and telecommunication industries. Established 1996 as spin-off of the Fraunhofer Institute of Production Technology Aachen we are now 2,700 P3 teammembers at 36 locations worldwide.P3 offers worldwide technical consulting and services for the telecommunications industry. As a leading international company we work for established network operators, suppliers, device manufacturers and regulatory authorities since 2001.Your responsibilitiesConsulting of network operators in analyzing, engineering and optimization of mobile networksAnalysis of designs and concepts of complex communication networksSupport of network operators in the migration from conventional to modern telecommunications networksEvaluation of measurement data (protocol analysis) and network KPIIdentification of failures and optimization potentialAssessment of core infrastructure, including IMS (Interviewing customer experts, Review technical documentation)Optimization of configurations and parameters in the PS core domainYour qualificationsMasterâ€™s degree in electrical engineering, computer science or related disciplineKnowledge in the area of VoLTE and related protocols, like RTP, RTCP and SIPKnowledge in analyzing, designing, dimensioning, auditing and optimization of core network elements, including IMSKnowledge of Backhaul and Backbone transmission technologies is beneficialGood overview on engineering aspects of communication networks in the area of mobile networksAbility to work in teamHigh flexibility and willingness to travel domestic and internationalFluent in written and spoken English, German is an advantageYour benefitsAn interesting, diversified and challenging working environmentA highly motivated and international teamExciting projects for prestigious customersPersonal and professional development opportunities from the start
title: Core Network Expert
